response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am confident it is worth more than its face value of $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value considering the immense benefits it promises. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 11500}
